caption: Relating to eligibility for membership on and the regulation of horse racing by the Texas Racing Commission and a prohibition on the conduct of greyhound or other dog racing as live events in this state; creating a criminal offense; authorizing a fee.
summary: This bill prohibits greyhound racing and other forms of dog racing as live events in Texas. While not directly targeting Chinese immigrants, it amends various sections of the Occupations Code to remove all references to greyhound racing and limit racing licenses to horse racing only. The bill allows existing greyhound racetracks to convert their licenses to horse racing licenses by January 2026 if they meet certain requirements.
translation: 该法案禁止在德克萨斯州进行灰狗赛跑和其他形式的狗类赛跑作为现场活动。虽然没有直接针对中国移民，但该法案修改了《职业法规》的多个章节，删除了所有与灰狗赛跑相关的内容，并将赛马执照仅限于马匹赛跑。该法案允许现有的灰狗赛马场在满足特定要求的情况下，在2026年1月前将其执照转换为赛马执照。
